observation:
This summary reflects the most recent observations only. The search for the word 'serendipity' on the Cambridge Dictionary website was successful. A sample sentence is also provided: 'There is a real element of serendipity in archaeology.' Additionally, related words and phrases related to 'good luck and bad luck' are listed, and several more example sentences are provided from the Cambridge English Corpus to illustrate the usage of the word.
